archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Aggregate Revenue Share
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Calculate the total revenue to be shared for a product offering when the party revenue sharing agreement specifies an aggregation must be provided. The aggregation is performed after the determination of the revenue share.

properties.value: Aggregate Revenue Share calculates the total revenue to be shared for a product offering when the party revenue sharing agreement specifies an aggregation must be provided. The aggregation is performed after the determination of the revenue share. For example, a flat rate model calculates a revenue share for each acquisition of a product offering, and this process would calculate the total revenue share.
